com.roadtonerdvana.jtelebot.request.factory

Class TelegramRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.roadtonerdvana.jtelebot.request.factory.TelegramRequestFactory

  • public final class TelegramRequestFactory
extends Object
    This class is a Factory of TelegramRequest objects
